name.ja: ゴーティスの<ruby>朧<rt>おぼろ</rt></ruby>キーフ

text.en: If you control a Fish monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field: You can target 1 of them and 1 of your banished Level 6 or lower Fish monsters; banish both that opponent's target and this card, and if you do, Special Summon your targeted monster. During the Standby Phase of the next turn after this card was banished: You can Special Summon this banished card. You can only use each effect of "Kiif, Haze of the Ghoti" once per turn.
